mapper.select: SELECT /* DashboardMapper.xml.getTeamCount */ COUNT(*) AS TEAM_CAPA, CASE WHEN ISNULL(E.dtl_cd_desc) THEN A.dtl_cd_desc ELSE E.dtl_cd_desc END AS TEAM_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CAPA FROM T_USER WHERE emp_no != 'admin') AS TOTAL_CAPA FROM T_USER U, T_COMMON_CODE A, T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.team_cd = E.dtl_cd WHERE CO.emp_no = U.emp_no AND U.use_yn = 'Y' AND CO.team_cd = A.dtl_cd AND CO.emp_no != 'admin' GROUP BY CO.TEAM_CD

SELECT /* DashboardMapper.xml.getProjectCount */ YM AS CUR_YYMM, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(NCCNT) AS NC_CNT, SUM(YCCNT) AS YC_CNT, SUM(YCICNT) AS YCI_CNT, SUM(YCCCNT) AS YCC_CNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(STRT_DT, '%Y-%m') AS YM, CASE WHEN CONT_YN = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NCCNT, CASE WHEN CONT_YN = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS YCCNT, CASE WHEN CONT_YN = 1 AND USE_YN = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS YCICNT, CASE WHEN CONT_YN = 1 AND USE_YN = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS YCCCNT FROM T_PROJECT_INFO WHERE STRT_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{curYYYY}, '%Y'), '%Y-01-01') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{curYYYY}, '%Y'), '%Y-12-31') AND END_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{curYYYY}, '%Y'), '%Y-01-01') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{curYYYY}, '%Y'), '%Y-12-31') AND PJT_TYPE_CD = 'N11' ) A GROUP BY YM
